DOC.brief_title: Immediate Postpartum Contraceptive Implant Placement Breastfeeding Success Women Risk Low Milk Supply : A Non-inferiority Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Immediate postpartum initiation etonogestrel contraceptive implant proven decrease rate rapid , repeat pregnancy . Evidence support healthy woman term infant initiation contraceptive implant 1-3 day postpartum appear adverse effect lactogenesis breastfeed continuation . However , high quality study date examine effect progestin-only contraception woman know risk low milk supply , include woman premature delivery , obesity , polycystic ovarian syndrome , diabetes , prior history low milk supply . The investigator goal measure impact time postpartum contraceptive implant insertion breastfeed success duration . This three-armed randomized non-inferiority study woman plan breastfeed , know risk factor low milk supply , intend use contraceptive implant postpartum . Women randomize one three group time contraceptive implant placement : within 30 minute placental delivery , 24-72 hour postpartum , 6 week postpartum . Women assess 6 week , 3 month 6 month postpartum . Outcomes include time lactogenesis II , duration exclusivity breastfeeding , continuation satisfaction contraceptive implant , side effect , include bleeding pattern , associate implant . Findings trial use clinician , hospital system , policy maker work expand access immediate postpartum implant support woman meet breastfeeding goal .
